title: Employee Cybersecurity Training Program
objective: To establish a comprehensive and continuous cybersecurity training program for all employees, focusing on the latest threat vectors such as AI-enhanced phishing and ransomware awareness, to enhance the overall cybersecurity posture of the organization.
timeline_phases: Phase 1: Needs Assessment and Content Development
kpis: Employee Feedback Scores on Training Quality
risks: Potential Low Engagement Levels in Training
